segments.text: Hi ! Dear ! I'm waiting for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , although we've chatted twice , I've been thinking of you already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . I want to know more about you , eg , what's your real name and what do you look like ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look , I am playing the piano for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , thanks . I wanna see the real you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I have no photo in my computer . And I have no scanner . I will show you later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! Before that I'll take this one as you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to tell you that I like you
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . Send you a kiss ...
segments.speaker: S1
